overview: David Vonk brings extensive experience in building world-class sales and services organizations at SAP and OutlookSoft Corporation. Prior to PivotLink, Vonk served as group vice president of North America Business User Sales at SAP, where he was responsible for driving the value of business user solutions, including SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence; Enterprise Performance Management; and Governance, Risk, and Compliance. Vonk joined SAP in 2007 through the OutlookSoft acquisition, where he was vice president of sales. Previously, Vonk served as assistant vice president of finance for First Union, where he focused on launching the credit card business, growing alternative revenue channels and M&A activities.
